text: If you install only one of the backends and have no other package installed that could hold the versions back, it should be fine.

text: Did you restart your session after updating? It's kind of impossible to get that error on the new versions :thinking_face:

elements.text: Did you restart your session after updating? It's kind of impossible to get that error on the new versions

text:
aha, no I didn't restart. I recreated the environment by deleting the Manifest.toml and Project.toml files, and adding GLMakie.
All within the current julia session. Retrospectively, not the best idea.
